thread.title: Eddie Howe not pointing finger at Artur Boruc after errors against Tottenham - Thurrock Gazette
thread.title_full: Eddie Howe not pointing finger at Artur Boruc after errors against Tottenham - Thurrock Gazette - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Thurrock Gazette
title: Eddie Howe not pointing finger at Artur Boruc after errors against Tottenham - Thurrock Gazette
text:
Harry Kane returned to form for Spurs as he helped himself to a hat-trick in the 5-1 victory - with Boruc at fault for three of Tottenham's goals. Matt Ritchie had fired Bournemouth into a first-minute lead before the Cherries' 35-year-old goalkeeper brought down Kane in the box, with the England striker levelling from the resulting penalty.
 Thurrock Gazette.
